title: The State of the Global Economy (John Ferguson, John Detrexhe and Rohan Silva) | BoF VOICES
itunes:title: The State of the Global Economy (John Ferguson, John Detrexhe and Rohan Silva) | BoF VOICES
itunes:subtitle: For the first time in years, all of the world’s major economies are growing again and yet geopolitical risk has never been higher. What to make of the apparent contradiction? #BoFVOICES 2017To sign up to the Daily Digest newsletter click the link here:
description:
For the first time in years, all of the world’s major economies are growing again and yet geopolitical risk has never been higher. What to make of the apparent contradiction? #BoFVOICES 2017
